4.74 ounces (134.5 g) | website = {{URL|https://apple.com/airpods-max|AirPods Max - Apple}} | manufacturer = {{plainlist|*[[Luxshare]] ([[contract manufacturer|on contract]]), [[Goertek]] ([[contract manufacturer|on contract]])}} }} '''AirPods Max''' are wireless [[Bluetooth]] [[Headphones#Circumaural|over-ear headphones]] designed by [[Apple Inc.|Apple]], and released on December 15, 2020. They are Apple’s highest-end option in the AirPods lineup, sold alongside the base model [[AirPods]] and mid-range [[AirPods Pro]]. The main changes of the AirPods Max over the mid-range AirPods Pro are the over-ear design with larger speakers, inclusion of Apple's Digital Crown (found on the Apple Watch), more color options, and longer battery life. ==Overview== Apple announced AirPods Max on December 8, 2020 via a website refresh, and released them on December 15, 2020. AirPods Max features an over-ear [[headphone]] design. AirPods Max have an [[Apple H1|H1 chip]] in each ear cup, which is also found in the second-generation [[AirPods]] and first-generation [[AirPods Pro]]. AirPods Max, like the AirPods Pro, come with Apple's [[Active noise control|Active Noise Cancellation]] technology for blocking outside noise, and Transparency mode for listening to sounds around users. The "Digital Crown", similar to that of the [[Apple Watch]], allows users to play or pause audio, control volume, skip tracks, control phone calls, and activate [[Siri]]. [[Proximity sensor|Proximity sensors]] automatically detect when they are on a user's head and play or pause audio accordingly. Spatial audio uses built-in [[Gyroscope|gyroscopes]] and [[Accelerometer|accelerometers]] to track movement of the user's head and provide what Apple describes as a "theater-like" experience.{{Cite web |last=Welch |first=Chris |date=2020-12-08 |title=Apple announces $549 AirPods Max noise-canceling headphones, coming December 15th |url=https://www.theverge.com/2020/12/8/21438042/apple-max-studio-noise-canceling-headphones-price-date |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=The Verge |language=en}}{{Cite web |title=Apple Announces AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones With Noise Cancellation, Priced at $549 |url=https://www.macrumors.com/2020/12/08/airpods-max |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=www.macrumors.com}}{{Cite web |last=Sherr |first=Ian |title=Apple announces $549 AirPods Max over-ear headphones, preorders today, launch Dec. 15 |url=https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-announces-549-airpods-max-over-ear-headphones-preorders-today-launch-dec-15 |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=CNET |language=en}} Apple claims 20 hours of battery life, with five minutes of charging delivering 1.5 hours of listening time. AirPods Max are charged via the [[Lightning (connector)|Lightning port]]. The Lightning port can also be used for line-in audio, with Apple selling cables with [[USB|USB-A]], [[USB-C]] and [[Phone connector (audio)|3.5mm headphone]] ends. AirPods Max are bundled with a Smart Case for storing. The Smart Case includes magnets that switch AirPods Max to low-power mode.{{Cite web |last=Lovejoy |first=Ben |date=2020-12-17 |title=PSA: How to switch off AirPods Max without Apple 'bra' case |url=https://9to5mac.com/2020/12/17/how-to-switch-off-airpods-max |access-date=2022-05-21 |website=9to5Mac |language=en-US}} AirPods Max is available in five colors: Space Gray, Silver, Sky Blue, Green, and Pink. Users can select from these five colors separately for the ear cushions and external chassis for a total of 25 color combinations (or 125 if using two different ear cushion colors).{{Cite web |title=Here Are All 25 AirPods Max Color Combinations You Can Make With Swappable Ear Cushions |url=https://www.macrumors.com/2020/12/08/airpods-max-color-combinations |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=MacRumors |language=en}} ==Compatibility== AirPods Max are compatible with any device that supports [[Bluetooth]], including [[Android (operating system)|Android]] and Windows devices, although certain features such as [[Siri]] require an Apple device running [[IOS 14|iOS 14.3]], [[IPadOS 14|iPadOS 14.3]], [[watchOS 7|watchOS 7.2]], [[tvOS 14]] or [[macOS Big Sur]].{{Cite web |title=Set up AirPods Max with your Mac and other Bluetooth devices |url=https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT211887 |access-date=2021-07-11 |website=Apple Support |language=en}} {{AirPods technical specifications}} == Criticism == [[File:Apple airpods max with case.jpg|thumb|AirPods Max with Smart Case]] The AirPods Max Smart Case's design has been mocked by technology reviewers, along with users on [[Twitter]] for its resemblance to that of a [[bra]] or [[Handbag|purse]]. Reporter Daniel Piper of Creative Bloq states: "If we're not entirely convinced by the design of the AirPods Max themselves, we're utterly baffled by that of their charging 'Smart Case'. The shape resembles, well, lots of things, from handbags to body parts."{{Cite web |last=December 2020 |first=Daniel Piper 08 |title=Forget AirPods Max, everyone's talking about Apple's new Smart Case |url=https://www.creativebloq.com/news/airpods-max-case |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=Creative Bloq |language=en}}{{Cite web |last=Hartmans |first=Avery |title=Apple's new $550 AirPods Max headphones come with a carrying case that people are already saying looks like a purse or a bra |url=https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-airpods-max-carrying-case-jokes-comparisons-purse-bra-2020-12 |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=Business Insider}}{{Cite web |last=Cooper |first=Gael Fashingbauer |title=The case for Apple's new AirPods Max could double as a bra, the internet decides |url=https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-airpods-max-come-with-a-smart-case-that-could-double-as-a-bra |access-date=2020-12-08 |website=CNET |language=en}} Numerous people have reported that [[condensation]] can build up near the [[Electrodynamic speaker driver|drivers]] of the closed-back headphones after prolonged use under the removable ear cups.{{Cite web |title=Apple AirPods Max Condensation Issue Forming Water Droplets on Under Removable Earcups, Near Drivers |url=https://www.msn.com/en-in/money/technology/apple-airpods-max-condensation-issue-forming-water-droplets-on-under-removable-earcups-near-drivers/ar-BB1cnejR |access-date=2021-01-05 |website=www.msn.com}} It has been suspected that the major cause is its full-metal body that naturally has temperature-dependent [[thermal conductivity]].{{Cite web |last=Hardy |first=Ed |date=2020-12-29 |title=AirPods Max condensation makes some owners sweat |url=https://www.cultofmac.com/731337/airpods-max-users-complain-of-condensation-inside-headphones |access-date=2021-01-05
